This kind of coordinated system has a track record of success with other complex crime and we should be applying it to mass shootings.
Whether it was Parkland or most recently Aurora, when law enforcement doesn’t coordinate and laws are not enforced, people who shouldn’t have guns fall through the cracks.
We have many levels of law enforcement and thousands of laws across this country that work every day to prevent gun violence, but we can do better.

We could create another law that does nothing but infringe on law-abiding citizens’ Second Amendment right or we could create a system that could have stopped the last mass shooting and might stop the next.
I joined several of my colleagues in introducing the Mass Violence Prevention Act to combat mass shootings as the federal government has done with terrorism, drug trafficking, and child exploitation.

Instead of Speaker Pelosi’s $1 offer for a wall, abolishing ICE, and weaker border security, President Trump and Republicans have secured $22.5 billion dollars to secure our border, including ➡️ pic.twitter.com/bQ6bJBBPHJ
This bill ensures the federal government doesn’t shut down, federal workers are paid, and our border will be more secure than it was yesterday.

Despite Speaker Pelosi promising no wall, there will be 55 miles of new border structure along parts of our southern border, nearly $1.4B in funding to build border structures, 1,200 more border agents & significant investments in surveillance technology because of this bill.

Last Congress, I voted time and time again for significantly more funding for a border structure, but each time, Democrats and Republicans let the perfect become the enemy of the good and because of that, we now must face the realities of a divided Congress.
Yesterday, I voted for the compromise border security and funding bill that passed Congress and President Trump is expected to sign.

My statement on tonight's State of the Union Address ⬇️ #SOTU pic.twitter.com/Os3AHCuMMQ
"We must choose whether we will squander our inheritance -- or whether we will proudly declare that we are Americans.  We do the incredible.  We defy the impossible.  We conquer the unknown.” #SOTU
"Many childhood cancers have not seen new therapies in decades.  My budget will ask the Congress for $500 million over the next 10 years to fund this critical life-saving research.” #SOTU
"Let us work together to build a culture that cherishes innocent life.  And let us reaffirm a fundamental truth:  all children -- born and unborn -- are made in the holy image of God.” #SOTU
"Both parties should be able to unite for a great rebuilding of America's crumbling infrastructure.”  #SOTU
"We passed a massive tax cut for working families and doubled the child tax credit.” #TaxReform #SOTU
"More people are working now than at any time in the history of our country—157 million people at work.” #SOTU
Watch the #SOTU here: https://www.whitehouse.gov/sotu/
